Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\Core\Routing\LinkGeneratorTrait in class Drupal\user_attendance\UserAttendanceListBuilder. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Link instead.

Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to user_attendance.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
